fr.n7.stl.block.ast

Interface Scope<D extends Declaration>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    HierarchicalScope<D>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RecordTypeImpl, SymbolTable

    public interface Scope<D extends Declaration>
    Interface to mark a node in the Abstract Syntax Tree as a Scope in the language.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean accepts(D _declaration)
      Check if a declaration can be registered in the scope.
      boolean contains(java.lang.String _name)
      Check if an element is registered (contained) in the current scope.
      java.util.Optional<D> get(java.lang.String _name)
      Provide either : - an empty option if the name is not contained in the scope
      void register(D _declaration)
      Register a declaration in the scope.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        java.util.Optional<D> get(java.lang.String _name)
        Provide either : - an empty option if the name is not contained in the scope. - an option contained the first value associated with the name if the name is contained in the scope.
        Parameters:
        _name - : Name of the element looked for in the scope.
        Returns:
        : An optional object that carry an element named _name if there exists one in the scope, empty if not.

      • contains

        boolean contains(java.lang.String _name)
        Check if an element is registered (contained) in the current scope.
        Parameters:
        _name - : Name of the element looked for in the current scope.
        Returns:
        : True if the scope contains an element named _name, false if not.

      • accepts

        boolean accepts(D _declaration)
        Check if a declaration can be registered in the scope.
        Parameters:
        _declaration - : _declaration which is checked.
        Returns:
        : True if the _declaration can be registered in the scope, false if not.

      • register

        void register(D _declaration)
       throws ForbiddenDeclarationException
        Register a declaration in the scope.
        Parameters:
        _declaration - : _declaration that is registedred in the scope.
        Throws:
        ForbiddenDeclarationException - : Thrown if the _declaration element is not accepted in the scope.
